IFA.DE.summary: LS Invest AG engages in the operation of hotels. The company operates hotels and holiday apartments in tourist places, including the Baltic coast in Germany, Gran Canaria in Spain, the Kleinwalsertal valley in northwest Austria, and the Costa Brava in the Dominican Republic. It also provides health services, such as sports, welfare, beauty, and rehabilitation services; and miscellaneous services, including golf course and travel agency services. The company was formerly known as IFA Hotel & Touristik Aktiengesellschaft and changed its name to LS Invest AG in February 2021. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Duisburg, Germany. LS Invest AG is a subsidiary of Lopesan Touristik, S.A.
